item.title: Roof Shade - Overview
item.description: Project Overview A lot of work into these roof shades… this is a many part series

item.title: Auto Roller Shade
item.description: We like to open and close the shades more now that we can ask Alexa to do it. THE END RESULT PARTS LIST Key bits that makes this work: The motor with a radio - Somfy Roll Up Wirefree R28 RTS Motor The motor radio to z-wave thing - Somfy ZRTSI RTS 16 Channel Z-Wave to RTS Plug-in Interface Wall Module Wink Hub - The z-wave thing to internet thing An Alexa Device - Echo Dot IFTTT There are also some other little bits that are needed, but are less exciting:
